articles.title: In Japan, 6 in 10 admit being addicted to their phones: ‘definitely an issue’
articles.description: A new survey reveals a surge in smartphone addiction in Japan post-pandemic, undermining well-being – especially among the young.

articles.title: Can molecules store data?
articles.description: Advances in electronic engineering have led to smaller data storage devices, but scientists are exploring biological storage for more efficiency.

articles.title: I tried the $3 drink loved by celebrities that burns fat like Ozempic
articles.description: The low-calorie drink claims to boost metabolism and enhance fat burning in the body - making your weight loss goals much more achievable. But does it really work?
